trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 변환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> 개체와 다른 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The KeyGestureConverter class only converts an instance <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> 들어오고</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> KeyGestureConverter 클래스 변환

trans-unit.source: The KeyGestureConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: KeyGestureConverter 인스턴스 간에 변환는 <xref:System.String>"+" 문자를 사용 하 여 보조 키와 키 사이의 구분 기호로.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 문자열 `Control+A` 는 into <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>속성 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>속성에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> 에</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> 변환 됩니다

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 텍스트 사용

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 지정 된 형식의 개체의 인스턴스로 변환할 수 있는지 여부를 결정 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>, 지정된 된 컨텍스트를 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.target: if destinationType is type ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 개체를 변환 하려고 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>, 지정된 된 컨텍스트를 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>인스턴스 간에 변환는 <xref:System.String>"+" 키를 사용 하 여 보조 키와 키 사이의 구분 기호로.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 문자열 `Control+A` 는 into <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>속성 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>속성에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> 에</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> 변환 됩니다

trans-unit.target: 문화권별 정보입니다.

trans-unit.target: 변환할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 변환 하려고 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref> 지정 된 형식으로 지정된 된 컨텍스트를 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.target: `destinationType`<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> 여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>인스턴스 간에 변환는 <xref:System.String>"+" 키를 사용 하 여 보조 키와 키 사이의 구분 기호로.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> would be converted into the string `Control+A`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>와 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>속성에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>문자열로 변환 됩니다 `Control+A`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>
